data.Name: Allocated
data.Description: The product characteristics are based on a calculation to assign a portion of an aggregate quantity to an entity from another entity further along the value chain.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Allowed
data.Description: The product characteristics are based on what is permissible by some governing authority  (company or regulatory for example) or contract obligation.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Estimated
data.Description: The product characteristics are based on calculated performance equivalents often derived from flow test or comparable model-based methods including virtual flow meters, phase behavior models, process models, etc.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Targeted
data.Description: The product characteristics are based on a desired value in order to meet a business or other organisational objective.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Measured
data.Description: The product characteristics are based on direct measurement using meters or other equipment.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Budgeted
data.Description: The product characteristics are based on a predetermined quantity in tandem with financial planning.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Constrained
data.Description: The product characteristics are limited by system architecture or extenuating circumstances
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Forecasted
data.Description: The product characteristics are based on calculated values projected into the future.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Simulated
data.Description: The product characteristics are based on a reservoir simulation model.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).
